hero.subtitle: Pehil njuɓɓudi stock jaajndi, walliindi AI ngam heblude njannguuji maa e ɓeydude ngalu maa.

features.title: Gollirɗe maa ñalnde kala
features.subtitle: Denndaangal fannuuji ngam njuɓɓudi njulaagu maa.

dashboard.title: Alluwal Njuɓɓudi
dashboard.desc: Yiyngo kuuɓtodinngo e golle maa, jeertinaango stock, e ballal AI.

products.title: Geɗe
products.desc: Njuɓɓudi stock, scan code-barres, yuɓɓo e taƴe, e limto ngalu stock.

pos.title: Kees
pos.desc: Heɓbu ceede, neldu ɗerewol njanngu, teeŋtin stock e sahaa gooto.

suppliers.title: Yeeyooɓe
suppliers.desc: Doggol yeeyooɓe, daartol njannguuji, e luumo 'Button-to-Button'.

orders.title: Njannguuji
orders.desc: Topito njannguuji soodogol, heɓ geɗe, kadi teeŋtin stock tawa a sonnaani.

accounting.title: Limto
accounting.desc: Topito yeeyirde, njannguuji, e limto ngalu sahaa e sahaa.

clients.title: Kliyanuuji
clients.desc: Doggol kliyanuuji, daartol soodogol, e pehe ngam tiiɗnude jokkondiral.

settings.title: Teelte
settings.desc: Teelgol application, njuɓɓudi gollooɓe, e teelgol bitik maa.

showcase.title: Yiyngo Wayloowo Fof
showcase.subtitle: Diisneteeɗo laaɓɗo, moƴƴinaaɗo ngam dañde sahaa.

how_it_works.title: Fuɗɗo Law
how_it_works.subtitle: Daaɗe tati newiiɗe ngam waylude njulaagu maa.

step1.title: Tagu Konte
step1.desc: Aawto application, teel bitik maa e nder mintaaji ɗiɗi.

step2.title: Scan Geɗe
step2.desc: Huutoro kamera telefon maa ngam ɓeydude stock maa law.

step3.title: Yeey & Topito
step3.desc: Waɗ yeeyirde maa arandeere, ndaara limtooji maa ina ɓeydoo.

testimonials.title: Ɓe Kooliimen
testimonials.subtitle: Yiy no Stockman wallirta njulaagankooɓe ñalnde kala.
testimonials.t1: Gila mi fuɗɗii huutoraade Stockman, mi majjintaako ceede sabu ŋakkere stock. AI ina jeertina kam sahaa fof!
testimonials.t2: Application o ina newii. Gollooɓe am njanngii ɗum e nder mintaaji 10. Njuɓɓudi kees ina heewi.
testimonials.t3: Miɗo yiɗi luumo ngoo! Miɗo waawi nannditde cogguuji e yeeyooɓe am, mi sooda ɗoon e ɗoon. Dañde sahaa mawɗo.

pricing.title: Suɓo Pehe Maa
pricing.subtitle: Cogguuji laaɓɗi, potɗi e mawneeki njulaagu maa.

faq.title: Lamɗe Duumiiɗe
faq.q1: Mbele ina gollira tawa internet alaa?
faq.a1: Eey, Stockman ina gollira e nder offline. Keɓe maa ina njokkondira so internet arti.
faq.a2: Kyen. Min kuutortoo ko kisal toowngal ngam reende kabaruuji njulaagu maa fof.

download.title: A hebliima ngam ƴellitde?
download.subtitle: Jokku e ujunnaaje njulaagankooɓe wayluɓe njuɓɓudi mumen.

footer.desc: Feere wootere ngam njulaagankooɓe hannde e Afrik.
footer.copyright: © 2026 Stockman. Hakkeeji fof ko min njeyi.

newsletter.title: Wontu Gineejo Stock
newsletter.desc: Jokku e 5000+ njulaagankooɓe, keɓaa deftere men : "Juumre 10 bonnoore ngalu maa".
newsletter.privacy: Alaa spam. Ittu innde sahaa fof.

whatsapp.message: A jaaraama, miɗo yiɗi anndude ko ɓuri ɗum e Stockman!
